mapper.sql: ${alias}.user_num as ${prefix}user_num, ${alias}.user_name as ${prefix}user_name, ${alias}.user_gender as ${prefix}user_gender, ${alias}.user_mobile as ${prefix}user_mobile, ${alias}.user_email as ${prefix}user_email, ${alias}.user_pwd as ${prefix}user_pwd, ${alias}.user_line_name as ${prefix}user_line_name, ${alias}.user_line_id as ${prefix}user_line_id, ${alias}.user_line_pic as ${prefix}user_line_pic
mapper.select:
select
from app_user appUser where user_num=#{userNum}
